changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE nhi_month_declaration_rule_check_report ( id bigint PRIMARY KEY, jhi_year_month varchar(255), status varchar, comment varchar, created_by varchar(50), created_date timestamp, last_modified_by varchar(50), last_modified_date timestamp );
CREATE SEQUENCE nhi_month_declaration_rule_check_report_seq START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1;
